The '''2007-08 [[Turkish Basketball League]]''' is the 42nd edition of the top-flight professional [[basketball]] league in [[Turkey]]. '''38''' |- |} Alpella and TTNET Beykoz were relegated to [[Turkish Second Basketball League]]. Erdemirspor and AliaÄa Belediyespor will play in Turkish Basketball League in 2008-2009 season. ==Beko Basketball League 2007/2008 Play-offs== ''Last updated June 5, 2008'' The '''2008 Beko Basketball League Play-offs''' is the final phase of the [[2007-2008 regular season]]. The Beko Basketball League play-offs started on Saturday, May 3, 2008 and ran through June 4, 2008 with the League finals. Quarterfinal and Semifinal series are 5-match series. The teams first to reach 3 wins goes through to the next round. The team which has won both regular season matchups starts with a 1â0 lead to the series. Final series are 7-match series and the team that is first to reach 4 wins is the champion of the Beko Basketball League. {{col begin}} {{col-2}} {{8TeamBracket | RD1=Quarter Finals | RD2=SemiFinals | RD3=Finals | group1= | group2= | RD1-seed1=1 | RD1-team1='''[[BeÅiktaÅ Cola Turka]]''' | RD1-score1='''3''' | RD1-seed2=8 | RD1-team2=[[Banvitspor|BandÄ±rma Banvit]] | RD1-score2=1 | RD1-seed3=4 | RD1-team3='''[[TÃ¼rk Telekom B.K.|TÃ¼rk Telekom]]''' | RD1-score3='''3''' | RD1-seed4=5 | RD1-team4=[[Galatasaray CafÃ© Crown|Galatasaray]] | RD1-score4=0 | RD1-seed5=2 | RD1-team5='''[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pilsen]]''' | RD1-score5='''3''' | RD1-seed6=7 | RD1-team6=[[PÄ±nar KarÅÄ±yaka]] | RD1-score6=1 | RD1-seed7=3 | RD1-team7='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD1-score7='''3''' | RD1-seed8=6 | RD1-team8=[[Antalya BÃ¼yÃ¼kÅehir Belediyespor|Antalya Belediye]] | RD1-score8=1 | RD2-seed1=1 | RD2-team1=[[BeÅiktaÅ Cola Turka]] | RD2-score1=1 | RD2-seed2=4 | RD2-team2='''[[TÃ¼rk Telekom B.K.|TÃ¼rk Telekom]]''' | RD2-score2='''3''' | RD2-seed3=2 | RD2-team3=[[Efes Pilsen S.K.|Efes Pisen]] | RD2-score3=0 | RD2-seed4=3 | RD2-team4='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD2-score4='''3''' | RD3-seed1=3 | RD3-team1='''[[FenerbahÃ§e Ãlkerspor|FenerbahÃ§e Ãlker]]''' | RD3-score1=4 | RD3-seed2=4 | RD3-team2=[[TÃ¼rk Telekom B.K.|TÃ¼rk Telekom]] | RD3-score2=1 }} {{col-2}} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !Turkish Basketball League
